TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceContractGenerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The ServiceContractGenerator type generates service contract code and binding configurations from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> description objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the ServiceContractGenerator to create tools or to modify the default contract generation process using an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Examples The following example shows the use of a ServiceContractGenerator to convert downloaded metadata into code.
[!code-cs[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#8](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c_customwsdlextensions.client/client.cs#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit targetCompileUnit) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to use to generate code.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Configuration.Configuration targetConfig) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to use to generate binding configurations.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit targetCompileUnit, class System.Configuration.Configuration targetConfig) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to use to generate code.
The instance to use to generate binding configurations.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance and the specified instance.
Gets the instance that contains the generated binding configurations.
Docs.value: A instance that contains the generated endpoint configurations.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects generated when generating service contract code and endpoint configurations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks These error and warning messages can be used by tools to display debugging information to users.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GenerateBinding (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, out string bindingSectionName, out string configurationName);
.method public hidebysig instance void GenerateBinding(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string bindingSectionName, string configurationName) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> to use to generate the binding configuration.
The name of the generated binding section.
The name of the generated binding configuration.
Docs.summary: Generates a binding configuration for the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding?displayProperty=fullName> instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The configuration name for the binding is taken from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding.Name%2A> property. Binding configuration names are made unique by adding integers to the binding configuration name.
The binding section name is the name of the binding configuration section that the binding configuration was added to.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference GenerateServiceContractType(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contractDescription) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> to use to generate the contract type.
Docs.summary: Generates a service contract type from the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
Docs.returns: A instance for the generated contract type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Other code artifacts may also get generated as specified by using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference GenerateServiceEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, out System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelElement);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference GenerateServiceEndpoint(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelElement) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to use to generate the contract type.
Docs.summary: Generates a service contract type and an endpoint configuration from the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
Docs.returns: A instance for the generated contract type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Other code artifacts may also get generated as specified by using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

Docs.summary: Gets a mapping from contract description namespaces to managed namespaces that is used when generating code.
Docs.value: A mapping from contract description namespaces to managed namespaces.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this property to associated a contract description namespace with a managed namespace that is used when generating code.
You can use the wildcard character "*" as the dictionary key to specify a managed namespace to use for any description namespaces that are not explicitly mapped to a managed namespace.
The default managed namespace is used when no namespace mapping is specified for a particular description namespace.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets options for generating service contract code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this property to specify various options for code generation. This enumeration has a <xref:System.FlagsAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

Docs.summary: Gets a mapping from contract descriptions to referenced contract types.
Docs.value: A mapping from contract descriptions to referenced contract types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Code is not generated for referenced contract types. Instead the referenced type is used.

Docs.summary: Gets the target object for generating service contract code.
